Proxy.label: Image Reader Core
Proxy.name: ImageReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads raw regular rectilinear grid data from a file. The dimensions and type of the data must be specified.
Documentation.short_help: Read raw regular rectilinear grid data from a file.

Proxy.Documentation: The Image reader reads raw, regular, rectilinear grid (image/volume) data from a file. Because no metadata is provided, the user must specify information about the size, spacing, dimensionality, etc. about the dataset.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataScalarType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property indicates the scalar type of the pixels/voxels in the file(s): short, int, float ...

IntVectorProperty.name: DataByteOrder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the byte order of the binary file(s).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataOrigin
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The coordinate contained in this property specifies the position of the point with index (0,0,0).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the size of a voxel in each dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfScalarComponents
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the number of components the scalar value at each pixel or voxel has (e.g., RGB - 3 scalar components).

StringVectorProperty.name: ScalarArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a text string listing a name to assign to the point-centered data array read.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileLowerLeft
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property determines whether the data originates in the lower left corner (on) or the upper left corner (off). Most scientific data is written with a right-handed axes that originates in the lower left corner. However, several 2D image file formats write the image from the upper left corner.

Proxy.label: PNG Reader
Proxy.name: PNGReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a PNG file into an image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The PNG reader reads PNG (Portable Network Graphics) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .png.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PNG reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the spacing to use for the image output by this reader.

Proxy.label: JPEG Reader
Proxy.name: JPEGReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a JPEG file into an image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The JPEG reader reads JPEG files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .jpg or .jpeg.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the JPEG reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the spacing to use for the image output by this reader.

Proxy.label: MRC Reader
Proxy.name: MRCReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a MRC file into an image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The MRC reader reads MRC (Medical Research Council) image files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .mrc but .st, .rec and .ali extensions are known to be commonly used as well.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to load.

Proxy.label: TIFF Reader
Proxy.name: TIFFReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a TIFF file into an image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The TIFF reader reads TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .tiff.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the TIFF reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomDataSpacing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To manually specify a custom spacing using **CustomDataSpacing**, set this property to 1 (checked).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomDataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the spacing to use for the image output by this reader. This is used only when **UseCustomDataSpacing** is set to true.

Proxy.label: Meta Image reader
Proxy.name: MetaImageReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads binary UNC meta image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The Meta Image Reader reads binary UNC meta image data, and produces uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data. The default file extensions are .mhd and .mha.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Meta Image reader.

Proxy.label: HDR Reader
Proxy.name: HDRReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a HDR file into an image data.

Proxy.Documentation: The HDR reader reads HDR (High Dynamic Range) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .hdr.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the HDR reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the spacing to use for the image output by this reader.

SourceProxy.label: Image Reader
SourceProxy.name: ImageReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a series of raw files into an time sequence of image datas.
Documentation.short_help: Read a series of raw files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The raw series reader reads raw files. The output is a time sequence of uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .raw.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadAsImageStack
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the reader will read the set of files as an image stack, rather than a temporal file series.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileDimensionality
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether the file(s) in this dataset contain slices (2D) or volumes (3D).

IntVectorProperty.name: DataExtent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the minimum and maximum index values of the data in each dimension (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax).

Documentation.long_help: Reads an OME-TIFF file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the OME-TIFF reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomDataSpacing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To manually specify a custom spacing using **CustomDataSpacing**, set this property to 1 (checked).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomDataSpacing
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the spacing to use for the image output by this reader. This is used only when **UseCustomDataSpacing** is set to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: IgnoreColorMap
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When checked, data values in the TIFF file will not be mapped to colors using the color map specified in the TIFF, if any. This is useful for files where the color map may be incorrectly specified.

SourceProxy.label: PNG Series Reader
SourceProxy.name: PNGSeriesReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a PNG file into an image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The PNG reader reads PNG (Portable Network Graphics) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .png.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadAsImageStack
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the reader will read the set of files as an image stack, rather than a temporal file series.

SourceProxy.label: JPEG Series Reader
SourceProxy.name: JPEGSeriesReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a series of JPEG files into an time sequence of image datas.
Documentation.short_help: Read a series of JPEG files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The JPEG series reader reads JPEG files. The output is a time sequence of uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .jpg or .jpeg.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadAsImageStack
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the reader will read the set of files as an image stack, rather than a temporal file series.

SourceProxy.label: MRC Series Reader
SourceProxy.name: MRCSeriesReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a series of MRC files into an time sequence of image datas.
Documentation.short_help: Read a series of MRC files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The MRC series reader reads MRC files. The output is a time sequence of uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .mrc but .ali, .st and .rec are also recognized.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: TIFF Series Reader
SourceProxy.name: TIFFSeriesReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a series of TIFF files into an time sequence of image datas.
Documentation.short_help: Read a series of TIFF files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The TIFF series reader reads TIFF files. The output is a time sequence of uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .tif or .tiff.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadAsImageStack
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the reader will read the set of files as an image stack, rather than a temporal file series.

SourceProxy.label: TIFF Reader
SourceProxy.name: TIFFReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a TIFF file into an image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The TIFF reader reads TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .tiff.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the TIFF reader.

SourceProxy.label: Meta File Series Reader
SourceProxy.name: MetaImageReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a series of meta images.
Documentation.short_help: Read a series of meta images.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Read a series of meta images. The file extension is .mhd

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the meta format. The standard extension is .mhd. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: DEM Reader
SourceProxy.name: DEMReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a DEM (Digital Elevation Model) file.
Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in DEM format

SourceProxy.Documentation: The DEM reader reads Digital Elevation Model files containing elevation values derived from the U. S. Geologic Survey. The default file extension is .dem. This reader produces uniform rectilinear (image/volume) data output.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the DEM (Digital Elevation Map) reader.

SourceProxy.label: Nrrd Reader
SourceProxy.name: NrrdReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads raw image files with Nrrd meta data.
Documentation.short_help: Read raw image files with Nrrd meta data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Nrrd reader reads raw image data much like the Raw Image Reader except that it will also read metadata information in the Nrrd format. This means that the reader will automatically set information like file dimensions. There are several limitations on what type of nrrd files we can read. This reader only supports nrrd files in raw format. Other encodings like ascii and hex will result in errors. When reading in detached headers, this only supports reading one file that is detached.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to read (or the meta data file that will point to the actual file).

IntVectorProperty.label: Data VOI
IntVectorProperty.name: DataVOI
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The data volume of interest (VOI). The VOI is a sub-extent of the data that you want loaded. Setting a VOI is useful when reading from a large data set and you are only interested in a small portion of the data. If left containing all 0's, then the reader will load in the entire data set.

SourceProxy.label: DICOM Reader (Single File)
SourceProxy.name: DICOMReaderSingle

Documentation.long_help: Reads DICOM regular rectilinear grid data from a lone file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: DICOM is a file format often used in medical imaging. This version of the reader reads a single file (as opposed to a collection of files). The DICOM reader currently only supports uncompressed files.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: DICOM file to load. This version of the reader only supports loading one file at a time.

SourceProxy.label: DICOM Reader (directory)
SourceProxy.name: DICOMReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads DICOM regular rectilinear grid data from a directory containing a file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: DICOM is a file format often used in medical imaging. This version of the reader will look at all files in the same directory of the selected file and load them as planes of the same data set. It is typically for 3D medical scanners to store planes as set of files in a directory.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A file in the directory of files to be loaded. The DICOM reader will actually load all valid DICOM files in the same directory as this file as part of the same dataset. This is typical of how DICOM files are often stored.

Documentation.long_help: This reader takes a .H file that points to a .H@ file and contains all the information to interpret the raw data in the .H@ file.

SourceProxy.name: HDRReader
SourceProxy.label: HDR Reader

Documentation.short_help: Reads a file in Radiance HDR format.
Documentation.long_help: Reads a file in Radiance High Dynamic Range format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: An HDR image is a high-bitâ€“depth image (normally 32 bits per channel) that contains color and brightness information across a very wide dynamic range.
